doc.title: 1001 Arabian Knots
doc.plot: 1001 Arabian knots is an in depth examination of the complicated Arabic traditions and its roots. Honest and rare account of all that is good about this great culture as well as of the elements that tries to burden it with their own agendas.

1001 Arabian knots is an in depth examination of the complicated Arabic traditions and its roots. Honest and rare account of all that is good about this great culture as well as of the elements that tries to burden it with their own agendas.
